amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for behavior detection officers and for the Screening of Passengers by Observation Techniques program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for Behavior Detection Officers or the SPOT program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A043) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A043) Failed by voice vote.
